import { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; class CourseApp extends Component { state = { /** * TODO: Instead of using this state variable to keep track of which page * we're on, use the URL in the browser's address bar (i.e. react-router) */ showSearchPage: false, course: { "status": "taken", "title": "Intermediate Programming", "number": "601.220", "term": "Spring 2020" }, color: "#a05dac" }; render() { const { course, color} = this.state; return ( /** * TODO: Refactor this code to reusable React components */
{

My Courses

Already Took

  1. {course.title}
    {course.term}
}
); } } export default CourseApp;
